title: Double check code
text: double check code and refactor as needed.

title: Necessary Code for Express
Heroku Steps
text:
**Heroku steps:**  
`git add .`  
`git commit -m <message>`  
`git push origin main``heroku login`  
`heroku create <name>`  
`git remote -v`  
`git push heroku main`  
`heroku open`
**for issues:**  
`heroku logs --tail`
